attributes.action: Automatically upgrade A2 motorcycle licence to A licence after 2 years
attributes.additional_details: Change the law, as the current situation means that riders retake the test on the same bike again, this makes very little sense, it would make more sense for it to go back to how it used to be where after two years you go fully the restricted.
attributes.background: After 2 years of having on A2 license, a rider will automatically get upgraded to an A license.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

A2 motorcycle licences to upgrade to an A license automatically after 2 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706650
